title: Bitdeer Technologies achieves milestone with the completion of Bhutan mining facility

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Will Keep Going Up by 100% a Year, Says Analyst Preston Pysh – Here’s Why
description:
Investor and podcaster Preston Pysh is predicting that Bitcoin (BTC) will put up 100% gains annually relative to fiat currencies. In a new interview with Scott Melker, Pysh says that Bitcoin will become an obvious store of value and a hedge against an increasing debasement of fiat currencies like the US dollar. “If I buy […]
